backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and read-only phone/crypto report lookup tables.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references for multiple frontend requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line descriptions of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styling defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables with global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Entry HTML page loading the React app with AntiFraud branding, manifest, icons, and main script.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation stating Phase 3a introduces a read‑only canister and requires no frontend changes.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back into the app shell.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, route fallbacks, and network‑first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting document title, routing logic, and global providers for identity, i18n, and queries.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory exposing only the analyzeText method for the backend canister.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, language selector, auth control, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Shows login button or user profile menu based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results including risk score, report count, categories, and status messages.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown to switch the app language using available language options.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Handles PWA installation flow, showing install button or manual install instructions depending on platform and installability.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Implements a full report submission form with validation, rate limiting, and structured report payload handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Displays structured fraud‑analysis results including risk level, explanation, and recommendation.
Shows user identity info, lookup history with management actions, and a logout button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and stores main, extra, and reports actors using the user’s identity and logs a readiness report once.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and identity management using Internet Identity with login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, tracks platform and install status, and exposes a method to trigger installation prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads, saves, and clears per-identity user history stored locally.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language selection and translation access using stored session preferences.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains Portuguese UI translation strings for navigation, forms, actions, results, and errors.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates agents and typed actors for the main, extra, and reports canisters on IC mainnet.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines and exports fixed canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines the Candid interface and TypeScript types for phone and crypto report queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines the Candid interface for the main canister’s text analysis function.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines the Candid interface and types for submitting reports and querying collaborative lookup data.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report indicating available canister actors and supported methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables including light/dark color schemes and accessibility tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the main UI for analyzing messages, emails, phone numbers, and crypto addresses with tabbed inputs and results.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays accordion-based explanations of verification methods with SEO setup and translated content.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Shows mission-related sections with icons and translated paragraphs, including vision, core mission, impact, values, and limitations.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders a privacy policy page using translated sections and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with localized text, SEO metadata, and defensive paragraph rendering.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a lightweight client-side router hook using history state and custom navigation events.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Provides deterministic email risk analysis using domain, TLD, pattern, and formatting heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a simple localStorage-based cooldown to limit repeated submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Analyzes messages for scam indicators using keyword weights, crypto patterns, URLs, and formatting heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets document title and meta description for SPA routes with branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Generates structured fraud‑risk results using heuristic indicators and localized explanation templates.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs dictionary-based translation of backend analysis text into the selected language.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages per‑user profiles in localStorage, storing history items and optional language preferences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining content paths, theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, architectural decisions, constraints, known issues, and official content requirements.
